Detailed Description

This struct defines the parameters for normalization correction
Parameters:
enable if the normalization correction needed
normalizationType "ModelBased", ....
filePath path and nameto normalization files
globalsens global sensitivity of the system in cps/(Bq/mL x mm)
verbosity level of output
